title: leavebuster
body:
got owned by leavebuster and was made to type "I agree" that I wont leave another game..

Mid ranked game "attempting to reconnect"
checked my internet was working properly - it was fine, just my league client crashed.
I can see why other people reported me, it was ranked.. 
This never happens to me? I think it was something to do with the live maintenance. Can anything be sorted out? or the ban revoked??
